description:
From code review, it looks like evacuate is hard coded to check for an admin context:
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/25991/13/nova/api/openstack/compute/contrib/evacuate.py

There are policy checks in place, but looks like there are extra checks that are not really needed.

Seems like better unit tests are also needed, just to double check the policy checks work correctly.
title: evacuate should not hard code admin authorisation check
